Probability Distribution¶

Description¶

The probability distribution function of the price returns \(P(r)\) has been extensively studied in different financial markets over different time scales

It has been empirically verified that the probability distribution \(P(r)\) consistently has a power-law decay in the tails

\begin{equation} P(r)\propto r^{-\alpha}. \end{equation}
